code: import React from'react';import{Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage}from'formik';import*as Yup from"yup";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DodavanjeGarderobe(){var initialValues={nazivVrste:"",ikonica:""};var validationSchema=Yup.object().shape({nazivVrste:Yup.string().max(45).required("Polje tip garderobe ne smije da bude prazno!"),ikonica:Yup.string().max(150)});var onSubmit=function onSubmit(data){axios.post("http://localhost:3100/vrsta_odjece",data).then(function(response){console.log("Uspješno dodavanje!");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dodavanjeGarderobe",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Formik,{initialValues:initialValues,onSubmit:onSubmit,validationSchema:validationSchema,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{className:"formContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:" Tip garderobe: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{name:"nazivVrste",component:"span"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{autocomplete:"off",id:"inputCreatePost",name:"nazivVrste",placeholder:"Unesite naziv tipa"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:" Slika: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorMessage,{name:"ikonica",component:"span"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{autocomplete:"off",id:"inputCreatePost",name:"ikonica",placeholder:"Unesite link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:" Dodaj "})]})})});}export default DodavanjeGarderobe;
